snippet: Valiant Bank, a small Swiss bank, became the first in the country to say that it would sign a deal with the United States aimed at ending a three-year tax evasion dispute with Switzerland.
abstract: Valiant Bank, a small Swiss bank, became the first in the country to say that it would sign a deal with the United States aimed at ending a three-year tax evasion dispute with Switzerland.

headline.main: Swiss Bank Becomes First to Participate in U.S. Tax Deal
